item.description:
Hey guys! It's that time again... Time to let the dogs mingle & exercise while we catch up. I thought it would be fun to kick start the season with a Memorial Day Picnic atmosphere. The indoor air conditioned play room is newly decorated & weather permitting we can also try out the new outdoor play yard. So tell all your friends to join us & remember to put on your sun block if you want to sit outside! Hope to see everyone there!
11:00am-1:00pm

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Memorial Day Picnic
